extension.summary: Demagorgon Addons
extension.description: The Demagorgon takes you to the next dimension of Kodi! ;)

extension.summary: Repository for my KODI plugins
extension.description: KODI Repository for stuff made by D. Lanik

extension.summary: M80 Radio
extension.description: Streams de rádio da M80 Radio, e rádios online temáticas. Este addon não é oficial da rádio M80, sendo feito por fãs e cujo conteúdo foi encontrado livremente disponível na internet.

addon.name: Bandmania
addon.provider-name: frenchdj, Demagorgon e bit.ly/[COLOR blue][B]AMO[/B][/COLOR][COLOR green]box[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Bandmania
extension.description: All your favourite bands, organized by music style. All sources are Youtube-based. To play all videos as a playlist, open the context menu on the first video you want to see, and press "play from here".

extension.summary: The ultimate destination for movie and tv buffs
extension.description: Behind Movies is a colection of the best youtube entertainment news channels.

extension.summary: The ultimate destination for movie buffs
extension.description: CineFix is the ultimate destination for true movie buffs and filmmakers.

addon.name: Fora da Box
addon.provider-name: frenchdj, Demagorgon e bit.ly/[COLOR blue][B]AMO[/B][/COLOR][COLOR green]box[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Fora da Box
extension.description: Tudo o que o media center já tinha, mais aquilo que ainda lhe faltava. Todo o conteudo deste addon provém do Youtube.

extension.summary: Hyperion Off for LibreELEC/OpenELEC
extension.description: Allows you to switch Hyperion off. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Hyperion Off
extension.description: Allows you to switch Hyperion off. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Hyperion On for LibreELEC/OpenELEC
extension.description: Allows you to switch Hyperion On. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Hyperion On
extension.description: Allows you to switch Hyperion On. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Hyperion Toggle for LibreELEC/OpenELEC
extension.description: Allows you to switch between Hyperion Grabber and Kodi. This addon requires you to make another config file called hyperion.config1.json and put it in the same folder with/without v4l2 code. one config file will be with , one without v4l2 configuration. When this addon is run, it toggles between the two config files. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Hyperion Toggle
extension.description: Allows you to switch between Hyperion Grabber and Kodi. This addon requires you to make another config file called hyperion.config1.json and put it in the same directory with/without v4l2 code. One config file will be with the other without v4l2 configuration. When this addon is run, it toggles between the two config files. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!

extension.summary: Irmaos Piologo
extension.description: Os irmaos Piologo sao uma dupla de comedia brasileira que ultrapassa todos os limites - ate os do bom senso!

extension.summary: We give you Metallica TV!
extension.description: MetallicaTV is dedicated to your favorite band, with all the official videos from Metallica, plus full album streaming.

extension.summary: Praias PT
extension.description: Webcams das praias portuguesas. Addon não oficial, fontes disponíveis na internet.

addon.name: PT.DocS.HD
addon.provider-name: frenchdj, Demagorgon e bit.ly/[COLOR blue][B]AMO[/B][/COLOR][COLOR green]box[/COLOR]

extension.summary: PT.DocS.HD
extension.description: Documentarios em [COLOR lime][PT][/COLOR] e [COLOR yellow][BR][/COLOR] com qualidade HD. Playlists organizadas por categorias com assuntos historicos e da actualidade. Toda a fonte vem de utilizadores do Youtube. [B][COLOR lime][ Aconselhado a ultima versao do youtube 5.*.* ][/B][/COLOR]

extension.summary: Addon dedicado à paixão pelo desporto motorizado
extension.description: Channels and Playlists organized by categories. Sourced from Youtube. [B][COLOR lime]Advised the latest version of youtube 6.*.*[/B][/COLOR]

extension.news: [add] Python 3 compat. [add] Settings -> Maintenance -> Delete temporary files [add] Settings -> General -> Rate video after watching [add] Settings -> API -> Enable API configuration page - when enabled, visit http://ipaddress:port/api to configure API keys from a web browser - port is configured in Settings - HTTP Server - Port [chg] Storing personal api keys in api_keys.json [chg] Storing login tokens in access_manager.json [add] youtube_registration module, register developer keys and use them by appending an addon_id=:addon_id parameter to youtube add-on plugin urls [add] screensaver=true parameter to /play route - no suggested videos, no post play events, don't ask for quality [add] play route for channel live streams - plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?channel_id=UCLA_DiR1FfKNvjuUpBHmylQ&live=1 [fix] search input, now works with Yatse [fix] Signature deciphering [fix] context menu after playback [fix] alternative player, do not append headers [fix] My Subscriptions (Filtered) channel matching [fix/upd] post play events happen post play [fix/upd] set title from metadata on play [upd] Use monitor to track api key changes [upd] Dutch strings [MB1968] [upd] French strings [bubuleur] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Spanish strings [roliverosc]

extension.description: IPTV Simple PVR Client unterstützt m3u Wiedergabelisten, Streaming von Live TV für Multicast/Unicast Quellen, Radiosender und EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.

O cliente de PVR IPTV Simple Client oferece suporte para listas m3u, transmissão de TV ao vivo de fontes multicast/unicast, transmissão de rádios e, ainda, suporte a guia de programação eletrônico - EPG.
Cliente IPTV Simple PVR com suporte a listas de reprodução m3u, transmissão de TV em direto de fontes multidifusão/unidifusão, ouvir estações de rádio e EPG.

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täielikult uuesti disainitud, et luua tänapäevane välimus samas säilitades klassikaline Aeoni tunnetus.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l’esprit classique d’Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
Полностью переработан, чтобы создать современный облик, сохраняя при этом классическое чувство Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
extension.news: [I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and/or improvements[CR][I]v6.0.14[/I][CR]- Add support for Artwork Beef and remove Artwork Downloader (deprecated)[CR]- Add support for plugin.video.specialfeatures[CR]- Add missing buttons to DialogMusicInfo[CR][I]v6.0.13[/I][CR]- Fix Landscape view Media Menu navigation[CR]- Fix missing lyrics fonts[CR]- Add prefer local logo option to music viz[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master
